name: The Warning
text: Easy / Standard [skull]: -X. X is the number of successfully completed saga actions. [cultist]: -2. Draw 1 card. [tablet]: -2. Heal 1 damage. [elder_thing]: -2. Heal 1 horror.
back_text: Hard / Expert [skull]: -X. X is 3 times the number of successfully completed saga actions. [cultist]: -2. Discard 1 random card from your hand. [tablet]: -2. Take 1 damage. [elder_thing]: -2. Take 1 horror.

name: The Golden Circle
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -1 (-3 at [[Night]] locations).
[cultist]: -X. X is the number of cards in hand (max 3).
[tablet]: -X. X is the amount of damage on you (max 3).
[elder_thing]: -X. X is the amount of horror on you (max 3).
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -2 (-4 at [[Night]] locations).
[cultist]: -X. X is the number of cards in hand (max 4).
[tablet]: -X. X is the amount of damage on you (max 4).
[elder_thing]: -X. X is the amount of horror on you (max 4).

name: The Fallen
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the number of revealed [[Tundra]] locations (max 4).
[cultist]: -X. X is the number of cards in your hand (max 4).
[tablet]: -X. X is the highest play cost of a hand asset in your play area).
[elder_thing]: -X. X is the highest play cost of an arcane asset in your play area).
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the number of revealed [[Tundra]] locations (max 5).
[cultist]: -X. X is the number of cards in your hand (max 5).
[tablet]: -X. X is the highest play cost of a hand asset in your play area +1).
[elder_thing]: -X. X is the highest play cost of an arcane asset in your play area +1).

name: Dragvandil
text: You have 1 additional hand slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Weapon]] asset. [action] if Dragvandil is readyy, Fight. You get +3 [combat] and deal +3 damage to non-[[Elite]], [[Humanoid]] enemies. [action] Exhaust Dragvandil: Fight. You get +3 [combat] and deal +2 damage to [[Elite]] enemies.

name: Egil's Hood
text: Each [[Berserker]], [[Cultist]], and [[Humanoid]] enemy engaged with you gets -3 evade. [reaction] When you commit a card to a skill test during an evade action, exhaust Egil's Hood: Double the matching icons on that card.

name: Runes of Protection
text:
Non-[[Elite]] [[Berserker]] and [[Cultist]] enemies cannot engage with you.
Reduce the difficulty of skill tests you perform during 'parley' actions by 2.

name: Thorolf's Bracelet
text: You get -1 [combat] and +1 [willpower]. [action] Parley. Test [willpower] (X) where X is the fight value of a non-weakness [[Humanoid]] enemy at your location. If successful, shuffle the chosen enemy into the encounter deck. If the chosen enemy is [[Elite]], automatically evade it instead.

name: Berserker's Fury
text: Revelation - Put Berserker's Fury into play in your threat area. You get +2 to all of your skills. Forced - When you would succeed by 4 or more: Take 1 damage and 1 horror. If your deck has 5 or more cards in it, shuffle Berserker's Fury back into your deck.

name: The Crown
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is twice the number of the current agenda).
[cultist]: -X. X is the number of [cultist] in the chaos bag +1.
[tablet]: -X. X is the number of [tablet] in the chaos bag +1.
[elder_thing]: -X. X is the number of [elder_thing] in the chaos bag +1.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is twice the number of the current agenda +1.
[cultist]: -X. X is the number of [cultist] in the chaos bag +2.
[tablet]: -X. X is the number of [tablet] in the chaos bag +2.
[elder_thing]: -X. X is the number of [elder_thing] in the chaos bag +2.
